page.title: 10ROCHE SCHOOL-THE CURRICULUM
page.content: Roche C P School serves the larger village of Roche and its surrounding farming communities.It has 154 on roll with a staff of 5 full-time teachers and 1 part-time teacher.It has its own canteen with a Cook-in-charge and 2 assistants. There is a secretary, an ancillary helper,3 supervisory assist ants, a care-taker, a cleaner and a road crossing patrol officer. In both Primary Schools within the area under survey, the curriculum includes all language activities- reading,writing,drama,spelling,grammar ,usage,comprehension,creative writing and poetry;mathematics-mental,problem solving,computation,investigational; environmental studies-science,history, geography;art and craft; music; physical education;religious education.
